results.title: What to Know About Herschel Walker’s Residency Status in Georgia
results.abstract: The Republican Senate candidate listed his Atlanta residence on public records as a rental property in 2021, while receiving a homestead exemption in Texas.

media.caption: Herschel Walker at a campaign event in Cumming, Ga., on Monday. Mr. Walker is in a fiercely contested Dec. 6 runoff against Senator Raphael Warnock, a Democrat.

results.byline: By Elizabeth Paton, Vanessa Friedman and Jessica Testa
results.title: When High Fashion and QAnon Collide
results.abstract: Two new Balenciaga campaigns ignited a firestorm that traveled from the internet to Fox News, fueled by allegations that the brand condoned child exploitation.

media.caption: The fallout began on Nov. 16, when Balenciaga published a campaign called Balenciaga Gift Shop, which featured images of children with the brand’s handbags that look like teddy bears in bondage gear.

results.title: Representative Donald McEachin, Virginia Democrat, Dies at 61
results.abstract: Mr. McEachin, who had just been overwhelmingly re-elected to his Richmond-area district, had been treated for colorectal cancer.

media.caption: Representative A. Donald McEachin pushed for legislation to address the effects of climate change and championed other Democratic priorities.
